description: This file defines a state management store for the game using zustand. It manages player-related data such as avatar customization, movement, progress, scoring, tutorial steps, and actions to modify this state.

methods.name: setHorseColor
methods.description: Updates the horse color in the game state.

methods.name: setRiderColor
methods.description: Updates the rider color in the game state.

methods.name: setQuality
methods.description: Sets the quality setting for the game (e.g., visual quality).

methods.name: setSpeedMultiplier
methods.description: Modifies the speed multiplier affecting movement speed.

methods.name: addScore
methods.description: Adds points to the player's score.

methods.name: setCheckpointAchieved
methods.description: Marks a checkpoint as achieved and updates progress.

methods.name: markTutorialDone
methods.description: Marks a tutorial step as completed.

methods.name: setLastInputAt
methods.description: Updates the timestamp of the last input received.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to initial values.
